channel.title: dave@scripting.com
channel.description: On the net since mid-70s. Started two Silicon Valley companies. Wrote for Wired. Fellow at Harvard, NYU. Founder of podcasting, blogging, RSS. Open web.

item.description: While the Senate reads the coronavirus relief bill, nearly 1,400 Americans may die from the virus.

item.description: The Dems may not be able to kill the filibuster, but maybe that's not even the best thing to do. Change the rules so that the minority party actually has to speak and be present in numbers to avoid cloture.
